entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of rain. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
